MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G13 postcode area of Glasgow. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a final repair on the underground cable network at Yoker Mill Road we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.30pm on 28th November 2020
